name: BELGHORIA JANAKALYAN SAMITY

address: AE - 592, Sector - 1, Salt Lake City, Kolkata - 700 064

briefDescription: Belghoria Janakalyan Samity is formed a non profitable organization with the mission of holistic development towards the weaker section especially for women and children economically and socially through delivery of microfinance services and social development activities like heath, education etc. At present, 50 fulltime employees are engaged in our work. The management team consists of professionals with experience in education, microfinance, natural resource management, pro-poor governance, water management, building primary, secondary, and tertiary community organizations to promote self-reliance, and research and training.
